description: Love the design philosophy and the way that you keep these in the repo rather than in some random cloud.
The UI is one of the best when it comes to API clients. I like this one more than Postman, since you don't have to log in to be able to store your collections.

I like that you keep the collections with your repo, this solves us having developers keeping their own collections with calls that others don't have. 

The only reason 4 and not 5 is that it is still missing some of the features of Postman I use, especially around automated testing but it will be there soon I'm sure.
summary: Finally a good alternative to postman
